name: change_playback_state
description: Changes the playback state of the currently playing media.

target_state.description: The target playback state (STOP, PAUSE, RESUME)

app_name.description: Optional; the name of the media application

name: next
description: Skip to the next media item.

name: previous
description: Skip to the previous media item.

name: replay
description: Replay the current media item from the beginning.

name: seek_absolute
description: Jumps to a specific position in the media, then resumes playing.

position.description: Absolute position in the media in seconds.

name: seek_relative
description: Adjusts media playback by a specified duration relative to the current position, then resumes playing.

offset.description:
Relative offset in seconds from the current playback position.
Positive values fast forward; negative values rewind.
